This style excels in creating magical atmospheric scenes for travel, cultural, and nature-themed projects. Enhance with keywords like detailed landmarks and snowy textures for optimal results.
description.zh: 借助 Nano Banana Pro，打造超写实雪景球，完美呈现冬日国家的建筑地标与自然风光，适用于品牌标识、景观设计及文化项目，营造魔幻氛围。

items.title: 超现实的黑白彩色页面
prompts: Create a psychedelic black and white coloring page featuring melting [SUBJECT] in the center, surrounded by large, playful shapes and smooth flowing patterns. The background includes whimsical and surreal elements such as sunflowers with eyes, melting eyeballs, melting hearts, melting mushrooms, clouds, and stars. Use bold, clean outlines and fully enclosed shapes to create distinct sections for easy coloring. Avoid excessive fine detail or clutter. Keep the composition open, spacious, and fun. Square aspect ratio with a white background. No text or color.
创建一个超现实的黑白彩色页面，中心是融化的[主题]，周围有大型、有趣的形状和流畅的图案。背景包括诸如带眼睛的向日葵、融化的眼球、融化的心形、融化的蘑菇、云朵和星星等奇幻和超现实元素。使用粗犷、干净的轮廓和完全封闭的形状来创建易于上色的不同区域。避免过多的精细细节或杂乱。保持构图开放、宽敞和有趣。方形长宽比，白色背景。无文字或颜色。

description.en: Unleash surreal fantasy interiors with the Nano Banana Pro models, creating bold black-and-white coloring pages featuring melting subjects and whimsical patterns. Ideal for art therapy, creative relaxation, or educational activities, these designs promote mindfulness through easy-to-color enclosed shapes. Try using keywords like psychedelic and playful to enhance your coloring experience.
description.zh: 使用Nano Banana Pro或Nano Banana Pro创作超现实黑白涂色页，以融化的主题和奇幻图案带来艺术疗愈与创意放松，适合日常减压或亲子活动，通过简洁轮廓促进专注与正念体验。

items.title: 卡通现代风格插画
prompts:
Transform this image into a Cartoon Modern Style illustration, inspired by classic UPA animation like Mr. Magoo and The Jetsons.
Redesign the character using flat, geometric shapes: ovals, rectangles, simple curves and angles. Avoid realistic proportions — the design should be stylized and abstract.
Use a limited color palette, preferably soft pastels or bold contrasts (e.g. mint green, salmon, sky blue, mustard yellow), with flat tones and no gradients.
Simplify facial features and body structure to be iconic and minimalist — large heads, small limbs, expressive poses, but with minimal detail.
The background should be minimal or symbolic, using basic shapes or abstract scenery (floating stairs, blocky furniture, stylized trees or stars).
The final image should look like a frame from a 1950s or 1960s modernist cartoon — playful, graphic, and highly stylized.

将这张图片转换为卡通现代风格插画，灵感来源于经典的 UPA 动画，如《摩根先生》和《太空家庭》。
使用扁平的几何形状重新设计角色：椭圆形、矩形、简单的曲线和角度。避免真实比例——设计应该是风格化的和抽象的。
使用有限的调色板，最好是柔和的粉彩色或鲜明的对比色（例如薄荷绿、三文鱼色、天空蓝、芥末黄），使用扁平色调且没有渐变。
简化面部特征和身体结构，使其具有标志性且极简——大头、小四肢、富有表现力的姿势，但细节极少。
背景应极简或象征性，使用基本形状或抽象场景（漂浮的楼梯、积木家具、风格化的树木或星星）。
最终图像应像 1950 年代或 1960 年代现代主义卡通的一帧——活泼、图形化且高度风格化。

description.en: Create vibrant cartoon modern illustrations with Nano Banana Pro models, featuring geometric shapes and limited color palettes. Perfect for character design, logos, and minimalist landscapes requiring UPA-inspired stylization. Try combining soft pastels with bold contrasts for dynamic visual impact.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，轻松创作充满几何形状和简约配色的卡通现代风格插画，适合角色设计、标志和风景，带来 UPA 动画的经典魅力。

items.title: 穿越梦境迷宫
prompts: [Character] sprinting past dream elements, Storybook illustration, Maze of floating doors, clocks, and whispers, Lantern glow and ambient sparkle trails, [Color1] and [Color2], Whimsical and fast-paced, Follow-cam style with trailing POV
[角色] 冲过梦境元素，故事书插画风格，漂浮的门、时钟和低语组成的迷宫，灯笼光芒和周围闪烁的轨迹，[颜色 1]和[颜色 2]，奇幻且节奏快速，跟随镜头风格，带有轨迹的 POV 视角

description.en: Create whimsical storybook illustrations with the Nano Banana Pro models, perfect for fantasy character scenes. These tools excel in producing fast-paced, dreamlike visuals ideal for book covers or animation concepts. Enhance your artwork with floating elements and ambient lighting for magical results.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，轻松创作奇幻故事书风格的插画，适合打造充满漂浮元素和光影氛围的梦境角色场景，为书籍封面或动画概念注入魔法般的视觉魅力。

items.title: Gorillaz风格
prompts:
Restyle this image into a gritty Gorillaz-style illustration, bold thick black outlines, sharp angular edges, flat expressive lighting, stylized high-contrast shadows, dirty distressed surface textures, muted color palette: washed-out teals, olive greens, rusty reds, mustard yellows, dusty browns, raw grungy urban atmosphere, comic book flatness mixed with painterly grit, hand-drawn finish with faded gradients, graphic novel aesthetic
with a rebellious, animated tone, dark stylish tone, full of attitude.
将这张图片改造成硬朗的 Gorillaz 风格插画，粗犷的黑色轮廓线，尖锐的角边，平面化的表现性光照，风格化的高对比度阴影，脏污的磨损表面纹理，柔和的调色板：褪色的蓝绿色，橄榄绿，锈红色，芥末黄，尘土棕，原始的粗糙都市氛围，漫画书平面感与绘画性粗糙的混合，手绘效果带有褪色渐变，漫画小说美学带有叛逆、动画化的风格，暗黑时尚的调调，充满态度。

description.en: Transform your visuals with the Nano Banana Pro models, crafting gritty Gorillaz-style illustrations featuring bold outlines and a muted color palette. Ideal for graphic novels, urban art projects, or branding that demands a raw, expressive aesthetic. Enhance results by emphasizing distressed textures and high-contrast shadows for an authentic hand-drawn feel.
description.zh: 使用Nano Banana Pro或Nano Banana Pro模型，将图像重塑为粗犷的街头插画风格，以浓黑轮廓和低饱和色调打造适合漫画与城市艺术项目的视觉表达。

items.title: 部分咬掉的糕点
prompts: A high-resolution, studio-lit macro photograph of a pastry shaped like a [SUBJECT], with a partial bite taken out, placed on a neutral matte surface with visible crumbs and soft shadows, highlighting texture and detail
一张高分辨率的、影棚照明的微距照片，展示一个形状像[主题]的糕点，部分咬掉，放在一个中性哑光表面上，有明显的面包屑和柔和的阴影，突出质感和细节

description.en: Capture stunning macro photography of partially bitten pastries with the Nano Banana Pro, delivering studio-quality lighting and texture detail. Ideal for food blogs, commercial advertising, or culinary portfolios to showcase appetizing realism. Enhance your shots using neutral backgrounds and soft shadow techniques for maximum visual impact.
description.zh: 使用Nano Banana Pro或Nano Banana Pro拍摄部分咬掉的糕点微距照片，呈现影棚级光影与细腻质感，完美适用于美食博客或商业广告，突出诱人细节与真实感。

items.title: 3D蓬松的物体
prompts: Transform the [BRAND NAME] logo into a hyper-realistic, 3D fluffy object. Keep the original shape and exact brand colors. Cover the entire surface in soft, detailed fur with a realistic hair texture. Use cinematic lighting to create subtle backlighting and soft shadows, making the logo appear tactile and surreal. Place the logo in the center of a clean black background, floating gently with a modern, stylish look. The style should feel cozy, playful, and visually striking. Render in ultra-high 4K resolution with photorealistic quality.
将[品牌名称]标志转化为超逼真、3D 蓬松的物体。保持原始形状和品牌的确切颜色。用柔软、细节丰富的毛皮覆盖整个表面，具有逼真的毛发纹理。使用电影感光效创造微妙的后光和柔和的阴影，使标志看起来有触感和超现实。将标志放在干净黑色背景的中心，轻轻漂浮，具有现代时尚感。风格应感觉温馨、俏皮、视觉上引人注目。以超高清 4K 分辨率渲染，具有照片级真实质量。

description.en: Transform your branding into a cozy, hyper-realistic 3D fluffy logo with the Nano Banana Pro models, maintaining original colors and cinematic lighting. Ideal for modern photography and logo design to create a surreal, tactile feel in clean settings. Use keywords like "soft fur texture" and "cinematic shadows" for enhanced realism.
description.zh: 借助 Nano Banana Pro，将品牌标志转化为超写实的 3D 蓬松物体，保留原色与蓬松毛发细节，结合电影级光影，打造温暖又超现实的现代品牌标识与摄影风格。

items.title: 品牌在悬浮平台上
prompts: A highly detailed cinematic advertisement scene featuring [TYPE OF ALCOHOL, BRAND], standing on a surreal floating platform that visually embodies its spirit. The platform is made of materials that represent the drink’s essence (e.g. sparkling crystals for champagne, rich dark wood for whiskey, frosted ice for vodka), with dramatic reflections and melting details dripping into a calm reflective water surface. A matching glass is filled with the drink, featuring artistic textures (ice, gems, swirling liquid). Soft, colorful sunset sky with dramatic clouds in the background, high-end luxury aesthetic, photorealistic, macro details, dreamy glow, premium product photography.
一个高度细致的影视广告场景，展示[酒类类型，品牌]，站在一个体现其精神的超现实悬浮平台上。平台由代表饮品本质的材料制成（例如香槟的闪亮水晶、威士忌的浓郁深色木材、伏特加的冰霜），戏剧性的倒影和融化的细节滴入平静的反射水面。一个匹配的玻璃杯装满了饮品，具有艺术纹理（冰块、宝石、旋转的液体）。柔和的彩色日落天空背景中有戏剧性的云朵，高端奢华美学，照片级真实感，宏观细节，梦幻般的光芒，高端产品摄影。

description.en: Capture cinematic branding visuals with the Nano Banana Pro, ideal for surreal product photography on floating platforms. Perfect for alcohol brands to showcase their essence through dramatic reflections and material symbolism. Use keywords: branding, landscape, product.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro，为酒精品牌打造超现实悬浮平台广告场景，通过戏剧性反射和材质象征，生动展现产品精髓，适用于品牌宣传和产品摄影。

items.title: 灯泡中的城市
prompts: Create a hyper-realistic, stylish poster featuring a light bulb lying on wet urban asphalt. Inside the bulb, place a miniature version of [CITY] with its iconic landmarks. A sleek white 3D text of the city name ‘[CITY]’ should stand prominently in front of the bulb. The background is a softly blurred cityscape with neon lights reflecting on the bulb’s glass and the wet pavement. Add volumetric moonlight for depth and atmosphere. The image should look like a high-quality DSLR photograph with sharp details, cinematic lighting, and a moody, futuristic vibe.
创作一张超逼真、时尚的海报，展示一个躺在湿漉漉的城市柏油路面上的灯泡。在灯泡内部放置一个[CITY]的微缩版，并包含其标志性地标。在灯泡前方，应突出显示一个光滑的白色 3D 文字，写着城市名称‘[CITY]’。背景是柔和模糊的城市景观，霓虹灯光在灯泡的玻璃和湿滑的路面上映射。添加体积光以增强深度和氛围。图像应看起来像一张高质量的数码单反相机照片，具有清晰的细节、电影般的灯光和忧郁的未来感。

description.en: Craft a hyper-realistic urban landscape with the Nano Banana Pro models, ideal for futuristic posters or photography projects. This style suits branding, artistic displays, and neon-lit promotional materials. Focus on wet reflections and volumetric lighting for a standout effect.
description.zh: 借助 Nano Banana Pro 模型，打造超现实的城市景观海报，完美适用于未来主义品牌宣传与霓虹摄影项目，突出湿润反射与立体光影的震撼效果。

items.title: 90年代风格的摔跤人物
prompts: Product photography, a 1990's style WWF Wrestling Figurine package with the figurine wrestler in the package being [your character]. The figure features bright colors, a detailed character design,  white background with professional studio lighting.
产品摄影，一个 90 年代风格的 WWF 摔角人偶包装，包装中的人偶是[你的角色]。人偶色彩鲜艳，角色设计精细，背景为白色，配有专业工作室灯光。

description.en: Capture the vibrant essence of 1990s wrestling memorabilia with the Nano Banana Pro models, ideal for product photography. This style excels in e-commerce and collectibles marketing, showcasing detailed character designs against clean white backgrounds. Use bright studio lighting to enhance the retro toy appeal.
description.zh: Nano Banana Pro 模型完美捕捉 90 年代摔跤纪念品的活力精髓，专为产品摄影设计，适用于电商和收藏品营销，在纯白背景上凸显色彩鲜艳、细节丰富的角色形象。

items.title: 吃掉你的文字
prompts:
Create the word “[WORD]” made entirely from its real texture and styled using the identity of the most iconic brand associated with it.

The word should:
• Visually reflect the material (e.g. honey, chocolate, soda, candy).
• Use the brand’s signature colors and typography.
• Include the brand logo beneath the word.
• Add a short slogan (3–4 words) matching the product’s vibe.
• Be centered in a minimal background inspired by the product (e.g. breakfast table, soda splash, cookie tray).

• Dimensions: 1:1
• Style: clean, bold, product-focused
• Render: ultra-HD, HDR, 8K

创建由其真实质感完全构成，并使用与其最具有标志性的品牌相联系的标识进行风格的“[单词]”。

该单词应：
• 视觉上反映材料（例如蜂蜜、巧克力、汽水、糖果）。
• 使用该品牌的标志性颜色和字体。
• 在文字下方包含品牌标志。
• 添加一个与产品氛围相符的简短口号（3-4 个字）。
• 居中放置在受产品启发的简约背景中（例如：早餐桌、汽水飞溅、饼干托盘）。

• 尺寸：1:1
• 风格：简洁、醒目、以产品为中心
• 渲染：超高清、HDR、8K

description.en: Craft stunning edible typography with Nano Banana Pro, blending minimalist branding and natural textures. Perfect for food product logos and packaging designs that pop with realistic material effects. Try keywords like "chocolate" or "soda" for iconic brand transformations.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro，打造以真实材质构成的文字设计，结合极简品牌风格与自然纹理，完美适用于食品品牌标识和包装，呈现生动逼真的材质效果。

items.title: 逼真的产品照片
prompts: A realistic product photo of a [brand name] [bottle or jar] sculpted entirely from fresh [ingredient name], arranged perfectly to form the shape of the original packaging, including a detailed and accurate label on the front. The background is a clean, soft light gray with a natural wooden surface. Studio lighting, soft shadows, 1:1 square composition, professional product photography style, ultra-detailed textures, vibrant and glossy finish
一个逼真的产品照片，展示一个[品牌名称][瓶子或罐子]，完全由新鲜[原料名称]雕刻而成，完美排列形成原始包装的形状，包括前面详细且准确的标签。背景是干净柔和的浅灰色，带有自然木质表面。工作室灯光，柔和阴影，1:1 方形构图，专业产品摄影风格，超精细纹理，生动有光泽的表面。

description.en: Capture stunningly realistic product photography with the Nano Banana Pro models, perfect for branding and natural aesthetics. Ideal for cosmetics and food industries to showcase vibrant textures and glossy finishes in professional settings. Use keywords like ultra-detailed textures and studio lighting for optimal results.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，轻松生成逼真产品照片，完美适用于化妆品和食品行业的品牌宣传，突出自然材质与光泽质感。通过专业摄影风格和超细腻纹理，展现产品在工作室灯光下的生动细节，提升视觉吸引力。

items.title: 超现实的高冲击力的图像
prompts: Create a hyperrealistic, high-impact image of a [subject] suspended mid-air, captured at the peak of an explosive moment. Surround it with dynamic [particles/splashes/fragments] that enhance motion and energy. macro-level detail, bold rim lighting, and a vibrant [background color] to emphasize form, texture, and contrast, cinematic, modern, and visually striking. perfect for premium product campaigns.
创建一个超现实的、高冲击力的图像，展示一个[主题]在空中悬停，捕捉到爆炸性时刻的巅峰。用动态的[粒子/飞溅/碎片]围绕它，增强运动感和能量。宏观细节，大胆的边缘照明，以及充满活力的[背景颜色]，以强调形状、质感和对比度，电影般的、现代的、视觉上引人注目。非常适合高端产品活动。

description.en: Capture hyperrealistic, high-impact visuals with the Nano Banana Pro models, ideal for cinematic and modern product imagery. These tools excel in premium advertising campaigns, enhancing motion and energy with dynamic details. Use vibrant backgrounds and bold lighting for maximum contrast.
description.zh: Nano Banana Pro 模型专为打造超现实高冲击力图像，捕捉爆炸性瞬间的悬停主体，动态粒子与鲜明背景增强动感与能量，适合高端产品广告，呈现电影级现代视觉冲击。

items.title: 工业内部品牌广告
prompts:
Create a hyperrealistic, surreal 1:1 advertisement for [Brand Name].
Transform the product into a miniature industrial factory or laboratory from the inside.
Reveal detailed internal systems: pipes, workers, glowing fluids, steam, and machines — all functioning to reflect the product’s core purpose (energy, beauty, flavor, etc).
Keep the outer product branding realistic and sharp.
Set the background minimal and cinematic.
Add the brand logo at the top, and a short, powerful slogan at the bottom.
Style: studio-grade lighting, high contrast, photorealistic textures.

创建一个超现实、1:1 比例的品牌广告。
将产品内部转化为微型工厂或实验室。
展示详细的内部系统：管道、工人、发光的液体、蒸汽和机器——所有这些都运作起来，反映产品的核心功能（能量、美丽、风味等）。
保持外层产品的品牌标识真实锐利。
将背景设置得简约且电影感十足。
在顶部添加品牌标志，底部添加一句简短有力的口号。
风格：影棚级灯光，高对比度，照片级真实纹理。

description.en: Craft hyperrealistic industrial branding visuals with the Nano Banana Pro models, ideal for minimalist product photography. These tools excel in creating surreal internal factory scenes for energy, beauty, or flavor brands, enhancing logo visibility. Use glowing fluids and steam effects to emphasize core purposes while keeping backgrounds cinematic.
description.zh: Nano Banana Pro 模型专为打造超现实工业品牌视觉，通过内部工厂或实验室的精细场景，突显能源、美妆或风味产品的核心功能，结合简约背景与品牌标识，呈现电影级广告效果。

items.title: 以动物为灵感的品牌
prompts: A high-quality studio photograph of a [BRAND + OBJECT] fully covered in ultra-realistic [ANIMAL] texture (e.g., fur, feathers, skin, or scales), placed against a soft neutral background. The object’s original shape, key design elements, and brand identity remain clearly visible beneath the animal’s organic surface. Integrate the official logo of the brand prominently into the composition. Automatically generate a compelling and brand-appropriate slogan that draws symbolic inspiration from the animal’s qualities and matches the tone of a premium advertising campaign. The image must feature clean composition, soft shadows, minimalist styling, professional lighting, and highly detailed textures—each hair, scale, or wrinkle should be visible in sharp detail. Format 1:1.

一张高品质的影棚照片，展示一个[品牌+物品]完全覆盖着超逼真的[动物]纹理（例如毛发、羽毛、皮肤或鳞片），放置在柔和的中性背景前。物品的原始形状、关键设计元素和品牌标识在动物的自然表面下依然清晰可见。将品牌的官方标志显著地融入构图。自动生成一个引人入胜且符合品牌调性的口号，从动物的品质中汲取象征性灵感，匹配高端广告活动的基调。图像必须具备整洁的构图、柔和的阴影、极简风格、专业的灯光和高度精细的纹理——每一根毛发、鳞片或皱纹都应在锐利的细节中清晰可见。格式 1:1。

description.en: Craft stunning animal-inspired branding visuals with the Nano Banana Pro models, blending minimalist design and ultra-realistic nature textures. Ideal for logo creation and brand photography, this style elevates organic aesthetics in fashion, luxury goods, or eco-friendly industries. Use keywords like animal fur, scales, and neutral backgrounds for compelling results.
description.zh: 借助 Nano Banana Pro，打造融合极简设计与超写实动物纹理的品牌视觉，适用于时尚、奢侈品或环保行业的标志创作与品牌摄影，以中性背景突显有机美学。

items.title: 黑客帝国的绿色代码
prompts: Transform this image into a digital Matrix-style scene. The background and subject should be composed of cascading neon green code on a black backdrop, similar to the iconic Matrix digital rain. Use glowing green symbols (Japanese katakana, numbers, and Latin letters), with some motion blur and depth. Add subtle lighting effects to simulate screen glow and enhance the cyberpunk, high-tech atmosphere
将这张图像转化为数字《黑客帝国》风格场景。背景和主题应由倾泻而下的霓虹绿色代码组成，在黑色背景下，类似于标志性的《黑客帝国》数字雨。使用发光的绿色符号（日语假名、数字和拉丁字母），带有一些运动模糊和深度。添加微妙的光照效果来模拟屏幕辉光，增强赛博朋克、高科技氛围

description.en: Transform your visuals into a Matrix-inspired digital landscape with the Nano Banana Pro models, featuring cascading neon green code on black for a sci-fi vibe. Ideal for creating cyberpunk logos, tech branding, or immersive sci-fi artwork with glowing effects and motion depth. Try using tags like landscape, neon, and sci-fi for optimal results.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，将图像转化为《黑客帝国》风格的数字场景，以霓虹绿色代码和黑色背景营造科幻氛围，适合打造赛博朋克标志、科技品牌或沉浸式科幻艺术。

items.title: 3D表情符号头部
prompts: Generate a hyper-realistic 3D render of a [EMOJI🐱] as a floating animal head with plush toy aesthetics. The design should emphasize ultra-soft, long fur, playful cuteness, and a childlike charm. Use a straight-on camera angle with soft, diffused lighting to create a warm and inviting glow. Keep the background pure white for a clean, modern look. The color palette should be vibrant yet soothing, enhancing the toy-like appeal. Style: Ultra-detailed, whimsical, and hyper-cute, blending realism with a soft, plush texture for maximum visual impact.
生成一个超逼真的 3D 渲染效果，将[表情符号 🐱 ]设计成一个漂浮的动物头部，具有毛绒玩具的美学风格。设计应强调超柔软的长毛、俏皮可爱和童真魅力。使用正面直视的相机角度，搭配柔和的漫射光线，营造出温暖诱人的光泽。保持背景纯白色，以呈现干净现代的外观。色彩搭配应鲜明而舒缓，增强玩具般的吸引力。风格：超精细、奇幻、超可爱，将现实主义与柔软的毛绒质感相结合，以达到最大的视觉冲击力。

description.en: Crafted with the Nano Banana Pro models, this hyper-realistic 3D animal head emoji combines plush toy aesthetics with ultra-detailed, vibrant charm. Ideal for digital content, children's products, and fantasy-themed branding, it adds playful appeal. Use soft lighting and white backgrounds to enhance its inviting glow.
description.zh: Nano Banana Pro 模型打造的 3D 表情符号头部，融合毛绒玩具美学与超写实细节，呈现柔软长毛和童趣魅力，适用于数字内容、儿童产品和奇幻主题品牌，以柔和光线与纯白背景营造温暖吸引力。

items.title: 创建半透明图标
prompts: Create a 3D-rendered icon of [Subject] in a dreamy, translucent, glass-like plastic material with soft pink and purple hues. glossy, smooth, rounded edges, glowing highlights, and soft shimmer or sparkle effects. UI, floating against a clean white background with soft shadows and natural lighting, elegant, and modern.
创建一个以[主题]为原型的 3D 渲染图标，采用梦幻般的、半透明的、类似玻璃的塑料材质，带有柔和的粉红色和紫色色调。表面光亮、边缘圆润、高光闪烁，并带有柔和的闪烁或闪光效果。UI 设计，悬浮在干净的白色背景上，带有柔和的阴影和自然光照，优雅且现代。

description.en: Craft dreamy translucent icons with the Nano Banana Pro models, featuring soft pink and purple glass-like aesthetics. Ideal for nature-themed UI designs, these icons add elegant 3D sparkle to modern interfaces. Try keywords like "glossy rounded edges" for optimal results.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，轻松创建梦幻半透明的 3D 图标，融合柔和粉紫色调与玻璃质感，为自然主题的 UI 设计增添优雅现代的光泽效果。

items.title: 纸上的小卡通角色
prompts: Imagine you’re a tiny cartoon character who has come to life on a piece of paper! Draw yourself running away from a giant pencil that’s trying to erase you. Add colorful pencils, a desk, and maybe some flying eraser bits for extra excitement. Use your wildest imagination to make it look like you’re bursting out of the page!
想象你是一个在纸上活过来的小卡通角色！画自己从一只试图擦掉你的巨大铅笔逃跑。添加彩色铅笔、书桌，也许还有一些飞行的橡皮屑以增加乐趣。用你最狂野的想象力让它看起来像是从页面上爆发出来！

description.en: Create vibrant paper-craft cartoon characters with the Nano Banana Pro models, featuring dynamic escapes from giant pencils in a lively 2D style. Perfect for children's book illustrations, animation concepts, or educational content where playful imagination leaps off the page. Try adding flying eraser bits and bold colors for extra whimsy in your designs.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 创作生动的纸艺卡通角色，以活泼的 2D 风格描绘从巨大铅笔逃脱的动感场景，适合儿童插画或动画设计，让创意跃然纸上。

items.title: 真人和风格对照直出

description.en: Create striking photo-to-illustration comparisons with the Nano Banana Pro models, featuring minimalist vertical compositions and urban fashion aesthetics. Perfect for branding projects and character design where visual contrast enhances storytelling. Try combining street photography with clean line art for maximum impact.
description.zh: Nano Banana Pro 模型能创作真人与动画风格的垂直对照作品，通过简约的街头摄影与插画对比，强化视觉冲击，适合品牌设计、角色开发和时尚插画项目，突出媒介质感和情绪差异。

items.title: 自定义纹理的复古玩具

description.en: Transform your uploaded images into nostalgic retro toys with custom textures using the Nano Banana Pro models. This tool is ideal for interior design visualization, nature-themed projects, or creating cheerful vintage-style product mockups. Try keywords like matte plastic and pastel backgrounds for authentic retro appeal.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro，将上传图像转化为复古玩具风格，轻松定制纹理，适用于室内设计、自然主题项目或怀旧产品展示，营造温馨愉悦的视觉效果。

items.title: 可爱的设计师玩偶
prompts: A cute designer doll styled as a [SUBJECT]. The doll has a porcelain face with blush, soft curly white hair, and large expressive eyes with unique pupils (like a star and moon). It wears a fluffy pastel-colored costume resembling the [chosen creature or idea], with detailed accessories like a hood with ears or horns, lace, and a ribbon. Embroidery on the paws reflects the character’s theme. The doll is sitting on a neutral background (like beige leather or soft fabric). The atmosphere is dreamy and whimsical, with soft lighting. Style: Korean collectible art doll, highly detailed, pastel color palette.

一个可爱的设计师玩偶，造型为 [SUBJECT]。娃娃有一张瓷脸，脸上泛着腮红，柔软的卷曲白发，还有一双富有表现力的大眼睛和独特的瞳孔（像星星和月亮）。它穿着一件蓬松的柔和色服装，类似于 [选择的生物或想法]，带有详细的配饰，如带耳朵或角的兜帽、蕾丝和丝带。爪子上的刺绣反映了角色的主题。娃娃坐在中性背景上（如米色皮革或柔软的织物）。气氛梦幻而异想天开，灯光柔和。风格：韩国收藏艺术娃娃，高度详细，柔和的调色板。

description.en: Create charming designer dolls with the Nano Banana Pro models, featuring porcelain faces, pastel costumes, and intricate animal-themed details. Perfect for character design, fashion illustration, and collectible art projects. Use tags like animal, character, and fashion to enhance visibility.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 创建可爱设计师玩偶，拥有精致陶瓷脸、柔美卷发和独特瞳孔，搭配柔和色调动物主题服饰与细节配饰，适合角色设计、时尚插画与收藏艺术创作。

items.title: 数字粘土雕塑
prompts: A digital clay sculpture of a [subject], captured in a [pose/action], resting on a minimalist [color] plinth etched with organic swirl patterns. The sculpt features smooth, flowing curves and a tactile finish, rendered in a refined [color palette] that evokes a soft, contemporary aesthetic.
一个 [主题] 的数字粘土雕塑，以 [姿势/动作] 捕捉，放在极简主义的 [彩色] 基座上，上面蚀刻有有机漩涡图案。雕塑具有流畅、流畅的曲线和触感，以精致的 [调色板] 呈现，唤起柔和的现代美学。

description.en: Create minimalist digital clay sculptures using the Nano Banana Pro models, featuring smooth curves and tactile finishes on organic-etched plinths. Ideal for contemporary art installations, product design visualization, or architectural presentations with a soft aesthetic. Enhance with subtle color palettes and flowing forms for maximum impact.
description.zh: 借助 Nano Banana Pro 模型，轻松创作极简数字粘土雕塑，流畅曲线与触感表面结合有机蚀刻基座，适用于当代艺术装置、产品设计可视化或建筑演示，呈现柔和现代美学。

items.title: 字母景观
prompts: the letter B beautiful and elegant decorated with a beautiful beachscape
字母 B 美丽典雅，装饰美丽的海滩景观

description.en: Create elegant landscape designs with the Nano Banana Pro models by transforming letters into scenic art. Perfect for branding projects and creative visuals where the letter B becomes a stunning beach landscape. Try "elegant typography" and "nature fusion" for unique compositions.
description.zh: 使用Nano Banana Pro或Nano Banana Pro模型，将字母B转化为优雅的海滩景观设计，完美适用于品牌项目和创意视觉，融合自然元素与精致排版，打造独特的艺术构图。

items.title: 经典的微型玩具风格
prompts: A miniature version of [LOCATION], designed in a whimsical dollhouse style. The structure is surrounded by thematic natural elements and tiny architectural details that reflect its cultural context (e.g., plants, paths, decor). The color palette uses soft pastels (such as coral, blush, sand, mint, or dusty green), with warm cinematic lighting and a serene, dreamy atmosphere. Highly detailed, cozy and stylized. Isometric view, vertical 9:16 format, on a clean studio background.
[LOCATION] 的微型版本，以异想天开的玩具屋风格设计。该结构周围环绕着主题自然元素和反映其文化背景的微小建筑细节（例如，植物、小径、装饰）。调色板使用柔和的粉彩（如珊瑚色、腮红色、沙色、薄荷色或灰绿色），具有温暖的电影照明和宁静、梦幻的氛围。高度详细、舒适且风格化。等距视图，垂直 9：16 格式，位于干净的工作室背景上。

description.en: Create whimsical miniature scenes with the Nano Banana Pro models, featuring soft pastel dollhouse aesthetics and isometric architecture. Ideal for toy design, architectural visualization, or serene social media content showcasing nature-infused tiny worlds. Enhance charm using tags like #miniaturestyle or #dreamyarchitecture for broader discovery.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，打造梦幻的微型玩具风格场景，融合柔和粉彩和等距建筑，适合玩具设计、建筑可视化或宁静社交媒体内容，展现自然与建筑交融的温馨世界。

items.title: 装饰艺术未来主义
prompts:
create image with 1:1 ratio 
[Brand] ad. Ultra-high-detail product photo in a fusion of Art Deco and Futurism. The product rest on platforms.  Background features stylized Art Deco skyscraper silhouettes morphing into Futurist speed lines, forming a diagonal left-to-right composition. Surfaces use brand Core Material and faceted glass with ambient lighting in Brand Color theme.  The product evoking motion and kinetic optimism. Dramatic low-angle lighting enhances reflections, with subtle vapor trails in the background.  Small logo on the bottom, and a tiny slogan beneath

以 1：1 的比例创建图像
[品牌] 广告。融合了装饰艺术和未来主义的超高细节产品照片。该产品位于平台上。 背景以风格化的装饰艺术摩天大楼剪影转变为未来主义的速度线条，形成从左到右的对角线构图。表面使用品牌核心材料和多面玻璃，并在品牌颜色主题中使用环境照明。 该产品唤起了动感和动感的乐观主义。戏剧性的低角度照明增强了反射，背景中带有微妙的蒸汽痕迹。 底部有小标志，下面有一个小标语

description.en: Elevate your branding with the Nano Banana Pro, showcasing an Art Deco and Futurism fusion for high-detail product visuals. Ideal for logos, photography, and ads, it creates dynamic motion and optimism in tech or luxury sectors. Use ambient lighting and diagonal compositions for standout imagery.
description.zh: Nano Banana Pro 融合装饰艺术与未来主义，打造超高清产品视觉，适用于品牌标识、摄影和广告，通过动态构图与光影营造科技或奢侈品领域的动感乐观氛围。

items.title: 将您的徽标放在月球上

description.en: Transform your brand into a lunar legend with the Nano Banana Pro models, crafting hyperrealistic moon landing scenes. Ideal for branding and photography, it places your logo on a flag in authentic NASA-style landscapes. Use clear logos for best results in nature or corporate imagery.
description.zh: 借助 Nano Banana Pro 模型，将您的品牌标志融入超现实的月球场景中，打造 NASA 风格的登月照片，完美适用于品牌推广与自然摄影。清晰上传标志即可生成专业级图像，增强企业或户外视觉冲击力。

items.title: 月光屋顶茶话会
prompts: A moonlight rooftop tea party between a girl and a boy, dreamy, gentle, painterly.
一个女孩和一个男孩的月光屋顶茶话会，梦幻、温柔、绘画。

description.en: Create dreamy painterly scenes with the Nano Banana Pro models, perfect for capturing gentle moonlight moments. Ideal for artistic storytelling, book illustrations, or romantic content creation. Enhance with soft lighting and ethereal textures for magical results.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，轻松创作梦幻绘画般的月光屋顶茶话会场景，适合艺术故事、插画或浪漫内容创作，捕捉温柔瞬间。

items.title: 后世界末日氛围
prompts: a young cartoon boy with big goggles and scarf driving a tiny makeshift vehicle in the desert, cute post-apocalyptic vibe, indie animation style, soft colors, emotional and adventurous --ar 3:4 --raw --p
一个戴着大护目镜和围巾的年轻卡通男孩在沙漠中驾驶着一辆小型临时车辆，可爱的后世界末日氛围，独立动画风格，柔和的色彩，情感和冒险 --AR 3：4 --原始 --p

description.en: Capture the charming post-apocalyptic aesthetic with Nano Banana Pro, delivering soft-colored indie animation scenes. Perfect for creating emotional vehicle adventures in cartoon series or game assets. Try using "makeshift desert vehicle" and "young explorer" for consistent thematic results.
description.zh: 借助 Nano Banana Pro，轻松打造柔美色调的独立动画场景，完美呈现后末日世界中情感丰富的车辆冒险，适合卡通系列或游戏素材创作。

items.title: 品牌虚拟人物
prompts: A fictional character shaped like a [Brand Name] product, wearing clothing that reflects the brand’s identity, sitting or riding on an oversized version of one of the brand's products as if it were a futuristic vehicle. The design features an expressive, dynamic artistic style full of motion and vibrant colors, with a large abstract version of the brand’s logo in the background. Freely drawn elements and colors representing the brand are scattered throughout. The background is light-colored, and the brand’s logo appears at the bottom. aspect 1:1
一个形状像 [品牌名称] 商品的虚构人物，穿着反映品牌身份的服装，坐在或骑在该品牌某件商品的超大版本上，就好像它是一辆未来主义的汽车一样。该设计具有富有表现力、充满活力的艺术风格，充满动感和鲜艳的色彩，背景是品牌标志的大型抽象版本。代表品牌的自由绘制元素和颜色散布在整个过程中。背景为浅色，品牌标志出现在底部。外观 1：1

description.en: Craft a vibrant futuristic brand mascot with the Nano Banana Pro models, featuring dynamic motion and expressive style. This character is ideal for fashion branding, logo integration, and creating eye-catching portraits in promotional materials. Use abstract logos and scattered brand colors for maximum visual impact.
description.zh: 借助 Nano Banana Pro 模型，打造充满动感与鲜明色彩的未来风品牌虚拟人物，适合时尚品牌推广、标志融合及宣传物料中引人注目的肖像设计。

items.title: 心爱的角色制作动漫风格的签名
prompts: A minimalistic black-and-white autograph design in a single-line drawing style, featuring the handwritten signature: [CHARACTER NAME], integrated with cute line art elements inspired by the character’s appearance and personality (for example: hair, outfit details, weapons, magical symbols). Include a small mascot or doodle of the character in simplified chibi style, surrounded by decorative elements (stars, hearts, sparkles, musical notes, flowers) that match their vibe. Clean, cute, modern design suitable for tattoo or sticker. High-resolution line art.
简约的黑白亲笔签名设计，采用单线绘图风格，带有手写签名：[CHARACTER NAME]，并融入了受角色外表和个性启发的可爱线条艺术元素（例如：头发、服装细节、武器、魔法符号）。包括一个简化的赤壁风格的小吉祥物或角色涂鸦，周围环绕着与其氛围相匹配的装饰元素（星星、心形、火花、音符、花朵）。干净、可爱、现代的设计，适合纹身或贴纸。高分辨率线条图。

description.en: Create minimalist anime-style character signatures with the Nano Banana Pro models, blending single-line drawings with personalized chibi elements. Perfect for fan art, merchandise branding, or digital content creation where clean aesthetics meet expressive character representation. Try incorporating symbolic items like stars or flowers that reflect your character's unique traits for a distinctive touch.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，轻松创作极简动漫风格角色签名，融合单线绘图与个性化Q版元素，适合粉丝艺术、品牌周边或数字内容，以简洁美学展现角色魅力。

items.title: 微型毛毡羊毛人物
prompts: A felted wool figure of a [subject], handcrafted with soft fibers, uneven stitching, and visible textures. Set within a miniature diorama of layered fabrics and pastel props, the scene radiates cozy, storybook charm like a still from a tactile, stop-motion fairytale made entirely of felt and thread.
一个 [主题] 的毛毡羊毛人物，用柔软的纤维手工制作，缝线不均匀，纹理可见。该场景设置在分层织物和柔和道具的微型立体模型中，散发着舒适的故事书魅力，就像完全由毛毡和线制成的触觉定格动画童话中的剧照。

description.en: Craft tactile felted figures with the Nano Banana Pro, capturing storybook charm through soft textures and miniature dioramas. Ideal for 3D art, cozy product photography, or whimsical portrait scenes in crafts and design. Use layered fabrics and pastel props for enchanting stop-motion style visuals.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 创作微型毛毡羊毛人物，通过柔软纹理和分层布景，打造温馨故事书般的 3D 艺术或产品摄影，呈现触感十足的定格动画风格。

items.title: 新卡通风格
prompts: Transform this image into a classic Tex Avery / Looney Tunes cartoon style. Use bold, clean outlines and exaggerated character features — huge eyes, stretched limbs, and over-the-top facial expressions. Emphasize slapstick comedy and visual humor. Colors should be vibrant and flat, with high contrast. Backgrounds should be simple, painted with soft gradients or flat colors, keeping focus on the character's action. Add motion lines, expressive effects (like sweat drops, stars, impact bursts), and a dynamic pose typical of 1940s Warner Bros. animation. The final result should look like a freeze frame from a mid-century animated short — full of cartoon energy and absurd charm.

将此图像转换为经典的 Tex Avery / Looney Tunes 卡通风格。使用大胆、干净的轮廓和夸张的角色特征 - 大眼睛、伸展的四肢和夸张的面部表情。强调滑稽喜剧和视觉幽默。颜色应鲜艳、平坦，具有高对比度。背景应该简单，用柔和的渐变或单调的颜色绘制，保持对角色动作的关注。添加运动线条、富有表现力的效果（如汗珠、星星、冲击爆发）和 1940 年代华纳兄弟动画的典型动态姿势。最终结果应该看起来像上世纪中叶动画短片的定格——充满卡通能量和荒诞的魅力。

description.en: Transform your images into vibrant cartoon masterpieces with the Nano Banana Pro models, perfect for creating classic Tex Avery-style characters and vehicles. Ideal for animation studios, game design, and marketing materials seeking bold, humorous visuals with exaggerated features. Try adding motion lines and high-contrast colors for dynamic slapstick comedy scenes.
description.zh: 使用Nano Banana Pro或Nano Banana Pro模型，轻松将图像转化为充满活力的卡通杰作，完美呈现经典Tex Avery风格的角色与载具，适合动画工作室、游戏设计和营销材料，打造夸张幽默的视觉效果。

items.title: 装饰艺术大都会
prompts: [SUBJECT] set within an Art Deco Metropolis, showcasing the grandeur and geometric elegance of 1920s architecture. Use streamlined forms and ornamental details, highlighting a sophisticated color palette of [COLOR1] and [COLOR2] to reflect the prosperity of the era.
[主题] 位于装饰艺术大都市内，展示了 1920 年代建筑的宏伟和几何优雅。使用流线型的形式和装饰性细节，突出 [COLOR1] 和 [COLOR2] 的复杂调色板，以反映那个时代的繁荣。

description.en: Capture the geometric elegance of Art Deco architecture with the Nano Banana Pro models, ideal for architectural visualization and design projects. These tools excel in rendering streamlined forms and sophisticated color palettes for urban scenes or historical recreations. Use keywords like "1920s grandeur" and "ornamental details" for optimal results.
description.zh: Nano Banana Pro 模型能精准捕捉装饰艺术建筑的几何优雅，适合建筑可视化项目，渲染流线型形式和精致色调，重现1920年代的宏伟与繁荣。

items.title: 人体工程学
prompts: Imagine a [piece of furniture] designed in the form of [creature/object/concept]. The design should be highly creative and sculptural, like an art piece. Use organic, flowing shapes and detailed textures. Make sure it remains functional and ergonomic. The goal is for it to be both visually striking and practical —something you’d expect to see as a museum-quality design object
想象一下以 [生物/物体/概念] 的形式设计的 [家具]。设计应该具有高度的创意和雕塑感，就像一件艺术品。使用有机、流畅的形状和详细的纹理。确保它保持功能正常且符合人体工程学。目标是让它既具有视觉冲击力又具有实用性——您希望看到的是博物馆品质的设计对象

description.en: Discover the Nano Banana Pro models, sculptural ergonomic furniture blending organic animal-inspired artistry with functional design. Perfect for high-end interiors or artistic installations, these pieces elevate spaces with museum-quality craftsmanship. Enhance creativity with flowing shapes and detailed textures for standout decor.
description.zh: Nano Banana Pro 人体工程学家具以动物雕塑为灵感，将有机流动形态与实用功能完美结合，打造高端室内空间的艺术焦点。Nano Banana Pro 通过细腻纹理与创意造型，为家居或艺术陈列注入博物馆级设计感，兼顾舒适与视觉冲击力。

items.title: 乐高风格套装
prompts: a realistic LEGO-style set featuring [COUNTRY]’s national treasure: [ITEM]. Photorealistic packaging with LEGO branding, box art showing the built model, the model assembled from LEGO bricks in authentic colors and details. Studio product photography with soft shadows and clear lighting, highly detailed, professional commercial render. Include box and bricks in the scene, focus on realism and LEGO-like style. 9:16.
以 [COUNTRY] 的国宝 [ITEM] 为特色的逼真乐高风格套装。带有乐高品牌的逼真包装，展示拼搭模型的盒子艺术，模型由乐高积木组装而成，具有逼真的颜色和细节。具有柔和阴影和清晰照明的工作室产品摄影，高度详细的专业商业渲染。在场景中加入盒子和积木，注重真实感和类似乐高的风格。9:16.

description.en: Capture photorealistic LEGO-style branding and product scenes with the Nano Banana Pro models, ideal for commercial packaging and landscape photography. These tools excel in creating highly detailed renders with authentic colors and studio lighting for professional product presentations. Use keywords like "realistic LEGO set" and "box art" to enhance visibility.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，轻松创建逼真的乐高风格套装，适用于商业包装和产品摄影，呈现高度细节和真实色彩的专业渲染效果。

items.title: 霓虹效果海报
prompts: a single [OBJECT] glowing vividly with internal neon light that matches its brand or essence — the glow must follow the object’s shape and details precisely without overexposing — cinematic studio lighting — rich reflective surface or texture — subtle ambient fog or mist around the object — sharp shadows and clean contrast — floating or standing on a soft reflective black surface — ultra-sharp details — 2:3 vertical layout — pure black background — high-Kelvin lighting to avoid yellow tint — ultra-HD photorealism — the glow must feel premium, dramatic, and emotionally pow

单个 [对象] 用与其品牌或本质相匹配的内部霓虹灯发出生动的光芒 — 光芒必须精确地跟随对象的形状和细节，而不会过度曝光 — 电影摄影棚照明 — 丰富的反射表面或纹理 — 对象周围微妙的环境雾或薄雾 — 清晰的阴影和清晰的对比度 — 漂浮或站在柔和的反光黑色表面上 — 超清晰的细节 — 2：3 垂直布局 — 纯黑色背景 — 高开尔文照明以避免黄色调 — 超高清照片级真实感 — 发光必须让人感觉优质、戏剧性且情感上充满情感冲击

description.en: Create striking neon-effect posters with the Nano Banana Pro models, featuring cinematic lighting and precise glowing details. Ideal for branding, photography, and promotional materials requiring vivid neon accents. Enhance with reflective surfaces and ambient mist for professional results.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，轻松创作霓虹效果海报，精准呈现物体内部发光细节，适用于品牌宣传和摄影作品，带来电影级光影与鲜明对比。

items.title: 鸟类羽毛制成LOGO
prompts: A detailed overhead shot of a fluid, colorful OpenAI logo created by arranging hundreds of naturally shed exotic bird feathers. Capture the incredible iridescence, delicate barbs, and varied textures against a misty white backdrop with side lighting.
流畅、多彩的 OpenAI 徽标的详细俯拍镜头，由数百根自然脱落的异国鸟类羽毛制成。在带有侧面照明的朦胧白色背景下捕捉令人难以置信的彩虹色、精致的倒钩和各种纹理。

description.en: Craft a stunning iridescent logo with the Nano Banana Pro models, using naturally shed exotic bird feathers for a fluid, colorful design. This nature-inspired artwork is ideal for branding in eco-friendly or creative industries, capturing delicate textures against a misty backdrop. Enhance realism with side lighting to highlight the feathers' intricate barbs and vibrant hues.
description.zh: 借助 Nano Banana Pro 模型，使用自然脱落的异国鸟类羽毛打造流畅多彩的虹彩徽标，适合环保与创意行业的品牌设计，在朦胧背景中突显精致纹理与生动色调。

items.title: 抽象液体排版文字
prompts: Abstract liquid typography spelling "text", made of thick, transparent water-gel with realistic refraction and soft shadows. Each letter appears sculpted from droplets with surface tension, smooth curves, and light reflections. Water droplets scattered on the surface, minimal background, hyper-realistic lighting, photorealistic render
抽象液体排版拼写“text”，由厚实、透明的水凝胶制成，具有逼真的折射和柔和的阴影。每个字母都由具有表面张力、平滑曲线和光反射的水滴雕刻而成。散落在表面上的水滴、极小的背景、超逼真的照明、照片级逼真的渲染

description.en: Explore minimalist liquid typography with the Nano Banana Pro models, featuring hyper-realistic water-gel letters and soft lighting. Ideal for photography, branding, and digital art projects to add a sleek, modern aesthetic. Use keywords like abstract, photorealistic, and transparent for optimal results.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，打造超现实的抽象液体排版文字，适用于摄影与品牌设计，呈现透明水凝胶字母的逼真折射和柔和光影，为数字艺术注入现代简约美学。

items.title: 可爱粉彩乙烯基人物
prompts: A cute pastel vinyl figure of [INSERT YOUR CHARACTER OR OBJECT], pastel colors (lavender, soft pink, baby blue), kawaii style with big round eyes and friendly smile, simple rounded shapes, stylized “RIP” detail somewhere on the figure or base, matching toy packaging in the background with themed art, studio product photo with soft lighting, minimal shadows
一个可爱的粉彩乙烯基人物 [插入您的角色或对象]，柔和的颜色（薰衣草色、柔和的粉红色、婴儿蓝色）、卡哇伊风格、圆圆的大眼睛和友好的微笑、简单的圆形形状、人物或底座上某处的程式化“RIP”细节、背景中的玩具包装与主题艺术相匹配、具有柔和灯光的工作室产品照片，最小的阴影

description.en: Capture the charm of kawaii vinyl figures with the Nano Banana Pro, perfect for minimalist product photography in soft pastel tones. Ideal for toy designers and artists creating stylized portraits with friendly details, this setup enhances visual appeal for branding. Use soft lighting to highlight rounded shapes and subtle RIP accents for a professional finish.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro，轻松捕捉可爱粉彩乙烯基人物的卡哇伊风格，适合简约产品摄影，以柔和色调和圆润造型突出玩具设计的视觉魅力。

items.title: 创建多种3D风格头像
prompts: Create a 3D-rendered digital illustration of a stylized cartoon boy character, standing in a neutral pose. The character should be rendered in a realistic-minimalist 3D style, with soft rounded proportions and plush matte textures — similar to high-end Cinema 4D + Redshift product renders.
创建风格化卡通男孩角色的 3D 渲染数字插图，以中性姿势站立。角色应以逼真的极简主义 3D 风格渲染，具有柔和圆润的比例和毛绒哑光纹理——类似于高端 Cinema 4D + Redshift 产品渲染。

He has a warm natural skin tone with rosy cheeks, dot eyes (or small glossy eyes), and soft curly dark brown hair. Facial expression is neutral or slightly curious. Outfit includes an olive green T-shirt with rolled sleeves, beige rolled shorts, and off-white matte sneakers with subtle stitching. He wears a dark olive crossbody satchel with a flap, and a slim black watch on his right wrist.
他有着温暖自然的肤色，红润的脸颊，圆点的眼睛（或有光泽的小眼睛）和柔软的深棕色卷发。面部表情中性或略带好奇。服装包括一件卷袖的橄榄绿色 T 恤、米色卷短裤和带有微妙缝线的米白色哑光运动鞋。他戴着一个带翻盖的深橄榄色斜挎包，右手腕上戴着一块纤细的黑色手表。

Render with soft, diffused lighting and gentle shadows underfoot. Use a 100% transparent background (PNG format) or very light neutral grey if previewed. Full-body composition, front-facing or light 3/4 view. Maintain a clean, high-resolution, polished render — ideal for a character design showcase or branding. Soft color palette with earth tones.
使用柔和的漫射照明和脚下柔和的阴影进行渲染。使用 100% 透明背景（PNG 格式）或非常浅的中性灰色（如果预览）。全身构图，正面或浅色 3/4 视图。保持干净、高分辨率、精美的渲染 — 非常适合角色设计展示或品牌推广。带有大地色调的柔和调色板。

description.en: Craft diverse 3D avatars in realistic-minimalist style using Nano Banana Pro models. Perfect for branding and character design with soft matte textures. Try tags like cartoon and minimalist for optimal results.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 创建多样化的 3D 风格头像，以逼真极简风格呈现，适用于品牌设计和角色塑造，带来柔和哑光质感。

items.title: 生物发光
prompts: [SUBJECT] depicted as a Mythical Creature Luminescence, with glowing edges that accentuate the fantastical and legendary aspects. Utilize [COLOR1] and [COLOR2] to enhance the mythical and enchanting qualities.
[对象] 被描绘成一个神话生物的发光，发光的边缘突出了奇幻和传奇的一面。利用 [COLOR1] 和 [COLOR2] 来增强神话和迷人的品质。

White Tiger depicted as a Mythical Creature Luminescence, with glowing edges that accentuate the fantastical and legendary aspects. Utilize icy blue and silver to enhance the mythical and enchanting qualities --ar 3:2 --v 7.0
White Tiger 被描绘成神话生物的发光，发光的边缘突出了奇幻和传奇的一面。利用冰蓝色和银色来增强神话和迷人的品质 --ar 3：2 --v 7.0

description.en: Create mythical creature art with glowing Nano Banana Pro models, perfect for fantasy animal illustrations. Ideal for book covers and game assets featuring luminous white tigers with icy blue and silver accents. Try "bioluminescent edges" for magical creature designs.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，轻松创作出带有发光边缘的奇幻生物插画，非常适合图书封面和游戏素材，突出神话动物的迷人光芒与传奇氛围。

items.title: 2D单词海报设计
prompts: Create a surreal 2D poster design based on the word “[KEYWORD]” — the layout should be dominated by kinetic typography where the word is visually shaped or distorted to reflect its meaning — integrate a symbolic flat minimal illustration that reinforces the concept — the style must be inspired by risograph print: only 2 bold contrasting colors (no gradients) — include a poetic, short quote that resonates emotionally with the keyword — background must be clean and minimal — composition must be vertical, with strong visual impact and artistic balance — the overall tone should feel cinematic, surreal, and graphic — ultra-sharp, high-resolution, no clutter

根据“[KEYWORD]”一词创作超现实主义的 2D 海报设计——布局应以动态排版为主，其中单词在视觉上被塑造或扭曲以反映其含义——加入一个象征性的平面最小插图来强化概念——风格必须受到 risograph 印刷品的启发：只有 2 种大胆的对比色（无渐变）——包括诗意的、 与关键词产生情感共鸣的简短引述 — 背景必须干净且最小 — 构图必须是垂直的，具有强烈的视觉冲击力和艺术平衡 — 整体基调应该感觉像电影、超现实和图形 — 超清晰、高分辨率、无杂乱

description.en: Craft surreal 2D word posters with kinetic typography and risograph-inspired minimalism using the Nano Banana Pro models. Ideal for artistic branding, editorial designs, or conceptual projects that demand bold visual storytelling. Try keywords like "freedom" or "chaos" for impactful results.
description.zh: 使用Nano Banana Pro或Nano Banana Pro模型，轻松创作超现实2D单词海报，结合动态字体与简约插画，适合艺术品牌和概念设计，以鲜明色彩传递情感冲击。

items.title: 三维几何效果
prompts: A bison in the center of an array of colorful geometric shapes, surrounded by symbols representing different aspects like family and home. The artwork features warm colors in an oil painting style, with an Art Nouveau illustration showcasing ornate details and colorful patterns. The scene also includes a night sky and desert landscapes. The artwork should have a rich texture and a three-dimensional effect with intricate detailing.
一头野牛位于一系列彩色几何形状的中心，周围环绕着代表不同方面的符号，如家庭和家。这件艺术品以油画风格的暖色调为特色，新艺术运动插图展示了华丽的细节和丰富多彩的图案。该场景还包括夜空和沙漠景观。图稿应具有丰富的纹理和具有复杂细节的三维效果。

description.en: Create stunning 3D geometric artwork with the Nano Banana Pro models, featuring ornate Art Nouveau illustrations in warm oil painting styles. Perfect for landscape illustrations and symbolic family-themed visuals with rich textures. Use tags like 3D illustration and landscape for optimal discovery.
description.zh: 使用Nano Banana Pro或Nano Banana Pro创作温暖色调的新艺术风格三维几何插画，结合野牛与家庭符号元素，打造纹理丰富的立体景观视觉效果，适用于象征性主题插画与装饰艺术场景。

items.title: 半透明晶体效果
prompts: a [SUBJECT] rendered as a translucent crystalline form with beveled edges, subtly glowing from within. Surfaces catch and reflect ambient light, revealing faint iridescent hues across its contours in dark background
一个 [SUBJECT] 渲染为带有斜边的半透明晶体形式，从内部微妙地发光。表面捕捉并反射环境光，在黑暗背景下在其轮廓上显示微弱的彩虹色

description.en: Create stunning translucent crystalline visuals with the Nano Banana Pro models, perfect for artistic and creative projects. These AI tools excel in product design, digital art, and branding by generating objects with beveled edges and inner glow. Try using subjects like jewelry or abstract forms for iridescent effects in dark settings.
description.zh: 借助 Nano Banana Pro，轻松打造半透明晶体视觉效果，适合产品设计和数字艺术创作，呈现斜边轮廓与内部微光，在暗调背景中展现迷人虹彩。

items.title: 生成电影氛围图
prompts: Cinematic still, A [ description of the character or action scene], with a [ background/environment], a dynamic angle, a [light effect or lighting condition], motion blur, high-resolution photography, a cinematic scene, cinematic lighting, and high contrast.
电影静止图像、具有 [ 背景/环境] 、动态角度、[光效或照明条件]、运动模糊、高分辨率摄影、电影场景、电影照明和高对比度。

description.en: Create cinematic atmosphere images with the Nano Banana Pro models, perfect for character and landscape photography in a dynamic, high-contrast style. These tools excel in film production, game development, and advertising for generating immersive scenes with motion blur and dramatic lighting. Try using keywords like "cinematic lighting" and "high-resolution" for optimal results.
description.zh: Nano Banana Pro 模型专为生成电影氛围图设计，适用于角色与风景摄影，以动态角度、高对比度和戏剧性光影打造沉浸式场景，是电影制作、游戏开发和广告设计的理想工具。

items.title: 复古风格图标
prompts: Create an illustration of a [OBJECT] in a retro cartoon style. Use only flat, solid colors with no gradients, smudging, airbrushing, or blur. All shading and highlights should be made from clean, separate color blocks. Outline all shapes with thick, bold black lines. Use a simplified color palette (such as teal, coral, mustard, and white) for a vintage feel. Add small sparkle accents or motion lines for charm, but keep the icon the clear focus. Set the illustration on a plain white background. The final result must be crisp, clean, and vector friendly with sharp edges and no texture or raster effects. Square aspect ratio.

创建复古卡通风格的 [OBJECT] 插图。仅使用单色，不要使用渐变、涂抹、喷枪或模糊。所有阴影和高光都应由干净、独立的色块制成。用粗大的黑色线条勾勒出所有形状的轮廓。使用简化的调色板（如蓝绿色、珊瑚色、芥末色和白色）以获得复古感。添加小的闪光点缀或动感线条以增加魅力，但保持图标的明确焦点。将插图设置在纯白色背景上。最终结果必须清晰、干净且矢量友好，具有锐利的边缘，并且没有纹理或栅格效果。方形纵横比。

description.en: Generate retro cartoon icons with the Nano Banana Pro model, featuring flat colors and bold outlines for a vintage look. Perfect for branding, apps, and merchandise needing nostalgic vehicle or character illustrations. Use limited palettes like teal and coral for authentic retro appeal.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，轻松生成复古卡通风格的图标，采用纯色块和粗黑轮廓，营造怀旧氛围，适合品牌、应用和商品设计，带来经典车辆或角色插画的魅力。

description.en: Transform your visuals with the Nano Banana Pro models, applying a minimalist prismatic crystal style for nature photography. This technique adds a premium, gem-like finish ideal for product design or artistic projects. Use metallic objects and sharp lighting for best results with keywords like polished and faceted.
description.zh: Nano Banana Pro 模型为您的自然摄影注入极简棱柱水晶风格，赋予金属或结构物体以宝石般的高端质感，适合产品设计和艺术创作。

items.title: 霓虹灯品牌重新构想
prompts: Create a cinematic advertisement for “[PRODUCT NAME]” — use bioluminescent neon lighting that matches the brand’s visual identity — place the product at the center of the scene with surreal, minimalistic composition — automatically adapt the environment to reflect the product’s nature (e.g. tech, fragrance, luxury, automotive, beauty) — integrate the brand’s actual logo in high fidelity — generate a short, powerful 3-word tagline that fits the brand’s tone — long exposure lighting effects — dramatic shadows — ultra-sharp focus — dark or ambient background — aspect ratio 2:3 or 1:1 — ultra-HD resolution

为“[产品名称]”创建电影广告 — 使用与品牌视觉形象相匹配的生物发光霓虹灯 — 以超现实、简约的构图将产品置于场景中心——自动调整环境以反映产品的性质（例如科技、香水、奢侈品、汽车、美容） — 以高保真度集成品牌的实际徽标 — 生成一个简短的、 符合品牌基调的强大 3 字标语 — 长时间曝光、灯光效果 — 戏剧性的阴影 — 超清晰焦点 — 黑暗或环境背景 — 纵横比 2：3 或 1：1 — 超高清分辨率

description.en: Elevate your branding with the Nano Banana Pro, featuring bioluminescent neon lighting in a surreal, minimalist style. Ideal for cinematic ads in tech, luxury, or beauty sectors, it adapts environments to highlight your product's essence. Use keywords like branding and nature for optimal impact.
description.zh: Nano Banana Pro 以生物发光霓虹灯打造超现实极简广告，自动适配科技、美妆或奢侈品场景，突出产品核心与品牌视觉。Nano Banana Pro 运用霓虹光影构建电影级品牌画面，融入高保真标识与简短标语，强化自然与奢华氛围，提升行业影响力。

items.title: 新卡通风格
prompts: Transform this image into the Foster’s Home for Imaginary Friends cartoon style. Use bold outlines, flat shapes, and vivid solid colors. Characters should have simplified, playful designs with exaggerated expressions and unique silhouettes. Keep the background minimal or stylized with flat patterns or textures. The result should look like a frame from a 2000s Cartoon Network show with whimsical, graphic charm.
将此图像转换为 Foster's Home for Imaginary Friends 卡通风格。使用粗体轮廓、平面形状和鲜艳的纯色。角色应该具有简化、俏皮的设计，带有夸张的表情和独特的轮廓。保持背景最小或使用平面图案或纹理进行风格化。结果应该看起来像 2000 年代卡通网络节目中的帧，具有异想天开的图形魅力。

description.en: Transform your images into vibrant cartoon scenes with the Nano Banana Pro models, perfect for minimalist character and vehicle designs. Ideal for animation studios or indie creators seeking playful, 2000s-style artwork with bold outlines and vivid colors. Try using tags like cartoon and minimalist for consistent whimsical results.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro 模型，轻松将图像转换为充满大胆轮廓和鲜艳纯色的卡通风格，适合制作简约角色与车辆设计，重现 2000 年代卡通网络的奇幻魅力。无论是动画工作室还是独立创作者，都能快速生成玩趣十足的图形化作品，适用于卡通、极简主义等标签，带来一致的异想天开效果。

items.title: 微型透明胶囊
prompts: Close-up, A hand holding a transparent capsule, inside it is a miniature model of [character name], wearing [their iconic outfit and accessories]. The character is posed in a [specific, expressive or dynamic pose], interacting with the inner surface of the capsule, as if they are frozen or confined inside. Hyper-realistic, cinematic, studio lighting setup, photographed with a macro lens.
特写，一只手拿着一个透明的胶囊，里面是一个 [角色名称] 的微型模型，穿着 [他们的标志性服装和配饰]。角色以 [特定、富有表现力或动态的姿势] 摆姿势，与胶囊的内表面互动，就好像他们被冻结或限制在里面一样。超逼真、电影般的工作室照明设置，使用微距镜头拍摄。

description.en: Capture hyper-realistic miniature scenes with the Nano Banana Pro, ideal for character-focused photography and fashion branding. These models excel in creating cinematic close-ups for logos, promotional materials, and artistic portfolios. Use macro lenses and studio lighting to enhance the dramatic, confined aesthetic in your shots.
description.zh: 使用 Nano Banana Pro，轻松拍摄微型透明胶囊中的角色特写，打造超现实、电影级的视觉效果，非常适合时尚品牌、角色摄影和标志设计。借助微距镜头和影棚灯光，捕捉角色在胶囊内的动态姿态，提升宣传材料和艺术作品的戏剧性美感。

items.title: 水果蜡烛
prompts: A minimal still life of a round glass candle filled with [fruit], labeled “[SCENT NAME]”, placed on elegant white silk fabric.
